plugin.name: modalbox
plugin.author: Alexander Koehn
plugin.title: This plugin adds the ModalBox to your Grails applications.
plugin.description: ModalBox is a JavaScript technique for creating modern (Web 2.0-style) modal dialogs or even wizards (sequences of dialogs) without using conventional popups and page reloads. It's inspired by Mac OS X modal dialogs. And yes, it may also be useful for showing larger versions of images. :) http://www.wildbit.com/labs/modalbox/
